audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Windows 7

name: Self-presenting creator
short_description:
A simple batch program, which provides you to create a self-presenting executable files from powerpoint (.pptx; .ppts) presentation that you can open on any device with Windows Vista or 7.

Program is based on:
 
Microsoft Powerpoint Viewer 
(http://www.microsoft.com/pl-pl/download/details.aspx?id=13)

WinRAR
(http://www.win-rar.com/download.html?&L=0)

Those programs WERE NOT MADE BY ME, they belong to its authors and I'm only using them in my project.

IF I'M ASKED BY THAT PROGRAMS OWNERS TO REMOVE MY PROJECT, I WILL DO IT

The icon is also NOT MY CREATION, it belongs to microsoft.

The program works on Windows 7, Vista 64 bit.

Only the batch scripts are my creation.

If you want you can modify them as you want and use them in your projects.
